notes: The first of a 4 vol. series reprinting the comic strip that ran from March 1, 1954 to November 15, 1956. 1. Detective and mystery comic books, strips, etc. I. Meiser, Edith. II. Giacoia, Frank. III. Doyle, Arthur Conan, Sir, 1859-1930. IV. Mason, Tom, 1958- Call no.: PN6728.S47M4 1989

115.heading: Meiser, Edith.

115.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle ; adapted, written, and illustrated by Edith Meiser and Frank Giacoia ; compiled and edited by Tom Mason.

The Red Headed League and Other Stories. VI. Series. VII. Malibu Graphics. Call no.: PN6728.S47M42 1991

120.title: "Romane von Gestern"
120.author: vorgestellet von H

notes: Discusses the novel series Meisterdetektiv Bob Hill/ Bob Hill im Wilden West.

121.title: Meisterhaft! : abenteuerliche Geschichten + knallharte Gestalten vom Leben selbst gezeichnet
121.author: Burkhard Fritsche.

122.title: Meitantei Konan = Detective Conan
122.author: Aoyama Gôshô.
notes: Summary (from Ohio State University cataloging): A high school boy, who is an excellent detective, is poisoned and shrunk to the size of a six-year old boy. This is a series of short stories about his adventures as a detective.

123.heading: Meitantei Konan. French.
123.title: Detective Conan
123.author: Gosho Aoyama ; traduit et adapté en français par Tisabo ; lettrage, Eric Montesinos.

124.heading: Meitner, Lise, 1878-1968.
124.title: "Key to the Future" 4 p. in Real Heroes, no. 14
124.author: [No author]
notes: "Driven from Germany by Hitler's persecution of the Jews, Dr. Lise Meitner brought with her the secret that may change man's destiny: The atom bomb."

125.heading: Meitner, Lise, 1878-1968.
125.title: "Lise Meitner"
125.author: by Jen Sorensen
125.appears_in: p. 37-48 in Dignifying Science : Stories about Women Scientists
